amendment.description: Amendment bars local governments from receiving grants if during the past fiscal year they spent less than 90 percent on law enforcement than they did the in the preceding fiscal year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 11 as printed in the Congressional Record) to bar any local governments from receiving grants if during the past fiscal year they spent less than 90 percent on law enforcement than they did the preceding fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
